content.prompt: In context, the author’s primary purpose in the first paragraph (lines 1-12) is to

choices.label: show his familiarity with Lincoln’s favorite stories
point out different errors that scholars have made
introduce a challenge that his topic poses
explain his skepticism regarding the state of the field

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
